title: Executive Order 12545-National Commission on Space
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and statutes of the United States of America, including Section 109 of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act of 1986 (Public Law 99-170), and in order to extend the time within which the National Commission on Space may submit its plan and recommendations, it is hereby ordered that Section 2(b) of Executive Order No. 12490 is amended by deleting the words "12 months" and inserting in lieu thereof the words "18 months".
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 10:56 a.m., January 15, 1986]
citation: Ronald Reagan, Executive Order 12545-National Commission on Space Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/258862
